message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll be interested in. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $130 for it.
I understand that $130 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can sell the product to you for $140.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $135 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $140, but I can offer you a slight discount if you're willing to make a decision now. I can sell the product to you for $138.
